description: $(thing)Imbuing$() is the skill of controlling and creating imbued power within items.$(br2)As you increase your $(thing)Imbuing$() level, you'll find more powerful enchantments and abilities, and be able to utilise that power in more creative ways.$(br2)$(l)NOTE:$() this guide is based on the mod defaults. Modpack/datapack changes may affect the accuracy of the following information
name: Imbuing
